name: scoring-system-monorepo
description: Scoring System - Monorepo with pnpm workspaces

scripts.test:security: cd packages/security-tests && bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate 2>/dev/null || true && pytest -v'
scripts.test:security:critical: cd packages/security-tests && bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate 2>/dev/null || true && pytest -v -m critical'
scripts.test:security:report: cd packages/security-tests && bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate 2>/dev/null || true && pytest -v --html=reports/security_report.html --self-contained-html'
scripts.test:security:setup: cd packages/security-tests && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
